attributes.action: bring in legislation to license pedal powered rickshaws in london and other cities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Within the city of westminster, the city of london,camden council and other bouroghs there are pedal powered rickshaws touting for business. the level of riding is dangerous and their constant disregard for the safety of the passengers and padestrians will end up with possible fatalaties. they also work with no insurance and regulary take work away from london cabs and pco registered mini-cabs, both of wich are controlled by legislation.
there is also the question of wether they are illegal immigrants, people not paying taxes, claiming benefit whilst working and a many other amount of things that are both illegal/un-lawfull or dangerous.
they are an uncontrolled passenger carrying vehicle in the uk's busiest city. they must be controlled before some-one dies.
